name: Zombie Runner (Torsten Maier)
description:
A sample of a first person shooter with zombie enemies, slowly dimming flashlight, and limited ammunition. Find the ammo and battery pickups around the map and kill the enemies.

Directions:

Use W, A, S, and D to move around. Aim with mouse movement. Fire with Mouse 1. Sprint with Left Shift. Jump with Space-bar. Switch weapons with 1, 2, or 3 or scroll through weapons with the mouse scroll wheel. 

1: Light Machine Gun (quick fire rate, 5 bullets to kill)

2: Assault Rifle (medium fire rate, 2 bullets to kill)

3: Sniper Rifle (slow fire rate, 1 bullet to kill) Right click to zoom
